name: Trivia Vault Football Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Football Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Football trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or Better Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
